group.name: After The Fall
group.description: Example gamestarts for the After the Fall mod:

gamestart.name: Just an honest scrap hauler
gamestart.description: A scraphauler trying to make ends meet. You start with a salvage station, a loyal crew, and a modest fleet of salvagers and freighters. In a time where the Xenon destroyed everything, there's money to be made in picking up the pieces. You start with the player HQ unlocked, and boron gate open.

gamestart.name: Just me and my fish ship.
gamestart.description: You and your loyal crew have limped back to safe space after a nasty brush with the Xenon. You have a light carrier, no fighters, almost no cash, and now you're probably going to have to haul cargo for a while until you can afford to buy enough fighters to start your 'cargo acquisition' empire again. You start with the player HQ unlocked, and boron gate open.

item.name: Property
item.value: Not much but your ship. But at least it's a nice ship.

gamestart.name: battlecarrier galaxy
gamestart.description: Your homeworld is destroyed, and you command the last surviving battlecarrier and it's fighters, protecting a ragtag fleet of civilian vessels. You are lost somewhere in the savage galaxy, and must chart a course to safety. Guide as many of the fragile civilian ships to a new home before the Xenon find and destroy them. Once there, build a new empire reclaim the galaxy from the Xenon threat. You must choose when to stand your ground, and when to flee. Will you bring these civilians to safety, or perish trying?
